data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: There are many dangers associated with traveling alone, such as being kidnapped, getting lost, and being attacked by wild animals, which can lead to accidents due to the failure to notify someone for help immediately. To avoid this, it is best to travel in groups of more than one person, be well prepared before you leave, and inform your family of your trip so that help can be given in time in case of danger.
data.referenceText: Discuss the hazards of traveling alone. How can these be mitigated?
data.referenceTranslate: 讨论独自旅行的危险。如何减轻这些问题?
